name: UpdateTask
description:
Update the details of an existing task.

Use this tool to modify the information of a specific task by providing its ID. Ideal for updating any details like status, description, or due date.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the task you want to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the task to update.

parameters.name: assignee_id
parameters.description: The ID of the person assigned to this task. It should be a string representing a valid user ID within the system.

parameters.name: task_body_html
parameters.description: HTML content for the task's body. This defines the main description or details of the task.

parameters.name: task_due_date
parameters.description: Due date for the task in RFC 3339 format, e.g., '2023-12-31T23:59:59Z'.

value_schema.description: Due date for this task, in RFC 3339 format

parameters.name: milestone_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the Milestone ID associated with the task to update its milestone.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project associated with this task. Required to specify which project's task is being updated.

value_schema.description:
Status for this task

* not_started TaskStatusNotStarted

* in_progress TaskStatusInProgress

* completed TaskStatusCompleted

parameters.name: task_title
parameters.description: The new title for the task. Provide a clear and concise title for better understanding.

parameters.name: customer_portal_visible
parameters.description: Set to true to make the task visible on the customer portal. Accepts a boolean.

value_schema.description: Customer portal visible for this task
